titleStmt.title: Valentinian, a tragedy as 'tis alter'd by the Earl of Rochester, and acted at the Theatre-Royal : together with a preface concerning the author and his writings, by one of his friends.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
Rochester, John Wilmot, Earl of, 1647-1680.
Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: The Preface concerning the Earl of Rochester by Robert Wolseley is lacking on film.
Prologue spoken by Mrs. Cook ... written by Mrs. Behn.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
